text:
e="preserve">Charles Osgood Wood III (born January 8, 1933), known professionally as Charles Osgood, is a retired American radio and television commentator and writer. He was born in New York City.
Osgood is best known for being the host of "CBS News Sunday Morning" from April 10, 1994, until September 25, 2016. He was also the narrator of the 2008 animated movie "Horton Hears a Who!".
